content.raw:
(Side note: One of the models included in this world, cinder_block_wide, was broken (no model.config or meshes in the object folder) and was thus causing a crash on startup for this world for me.)

The black screen hang issue is because drc_practice_task_2.world takes too long to load, and Gazebo times out before the models finish loading. Gazebo has a 10-second waiting period where it waits for the models to get loaded. After modifying Gazebo to have a timeout of 100 seconds, the task 2 world was loading for me in about 15 seconds. This means that either this world should be scaled down for better performance, or Gazebo should have more intelligent timeout behavior.

A temporary fix if you have gazebo installed from source:

Change gazebo/gazebo.cc, line 180, to the following...

```
#!c++
int maxWaitCount = 20;
```
